org.grouplens.lenskit.vectors

Class MutableVec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.vectors.Vec
      • org.grouplens.lenskit.vectors.MutableVec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Deprecated. 
    Use vectorz instead.

    @Deprecated
public final class MutableVec
extends Vec
    Mutable Vec. This vector can be modified and is not thread-safe. Create one with create(int) or wrap(double[]).
    Since:
    1.3
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
    Compatibility
    Public
